attributes.action: Allow Free Postage to Soldiers, Sailors and Airmen when they are on active service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many families have members who serve in many of our armed forces, and whose members may be many thousands of miles away.

For these men and women, a letter or package from home is a welcome and loved reminder.

Be it letters of love and encouragement, to packages of books, socks and cake, these postal items are loved and respected by all serving personnel.

It should be recognised by HM Govt that the serving staff are abroad at the orders of the Govt, and that all mail to and from the various Fronts are to be supplied by the Govt that put those men and women there.
I ask only that mail should be free to people who are prepared to die for this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
